main.name: Brandon Cermak
main.bio: Brandon is a web developer with an extensive background in operational management. A willingness to do any task to get the job done allowed Brandon to rise to the top of the ranks in hotel management, and this willingness will allow him to thrive in any role at your company.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Gained a wealth of knowledge regarding email, social, event, SEO, and targeted marketing
A 24-week intensive program focused on gaining technical programming skills in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Firebase, Node Js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handelbars.js & ReactJS.

work.title: Client Success Manager
work.description: Managed full-scope housing needs for large events such as ACL, Barrett Jackson Auctions, or F1 Racing. This includes everything from negotiating contracts to individual reservation management. Also oversaw first fully-managed international contract (F1 Dutch GP), and helped to develop upgraded SOPs/Training Materials for company post-acquisition

work.title: Enterprise Sales Development
work.description: Managed lead-generation/sales development process for Ford-owned start-up, Chariot. Worked hand-in-hand with the Account Executive for my region to establish a smooth sales process for future clients. Successfully garnished and converted leads from fortune 500 companies in a brand new market.

work.title: Opening Assistant General Manager
work.description: Opening AGM for brand new airport hotel. Oversaw operations from pre-construction through opening. Hired and trained over 30 associates, successfully built/opened hotel that exceeded Hyatt brand-standards, and personally managed our first account that exceeded $1 million of annual revenue (United Airlines).
